title: Add Altered Imports Tuner Shop Page

requirements.text:
Create a Tuner Shop page at `frontend/src/pages/TunerShopPage.tsx` displaying all content for 'Altered Imports'. The page must include the following sections, styled with the app's dark asphalt/amber automotive theme (dark backgrounds, amber/orange accent colors, high-contrast white text, Rajdhani/Inter fonts):

1. **Hero section**: Shop name 'Altered Imports' as a large heading, with the subheading 'Performance-focused automotive shop built for enthusiasts who demand more from their cars.'

2. **About/Mission section**: Full description ‚Äî 'We specialize in Honda and Acura platforms, delivering everything from stock rebuilds to full custom motor swaps, precision tuning, and complete drivetrain solutions. Our mission is simple: build reliable, powerful, and personalized vehicles that match our customers' vision‚Äîwhether that's a clean daily driver, a street-focused build, or a track-ready setup. We combine hands-on experience with modern tuning technology to deliver real, measurable results.'

3. **Services section** with a 'What We Specialize In' heading, displaying the following as styled cards or a list:
   - Honda & Acura Performance
   - Custom Engine Swaps
   - Full & Partial Engine Rebuilds
   - Custom Modifications & Vehicle Customization
   - ECU Chipping & Engine Management
   - Dyno Tuning & Street Tuning
   - Transmission Rebuilds & Drivetrain Services

4. **Closing paragraph**: 'From precise ECU calibration to complete powertrain transformations, every build at Altered Imports is handled with attention to detail, reliability, and performance-first thinking. We don't believe in shortcuts‚Äîonly clean work, proven setups, and honest results. Whether you're upgrading, rebuilding, or starting from scratch, Altered Imports is where passion meets precision.'

5. **Tagline**: 'Build different. Build altered.' displayed prominently in amber/orange accent styling.

6. **Location section** with a 'üìç Location' heading: Display 'Wenatchee'

7. **Contact section** with a 'üì© Contact' heading: Display Instagram handle as a styled link ‚Äî **Instagram: @mr.altered** (links to https://www.instagram.com/mr.altered in a new tab), and phone number as a styled tappable link ‚Äî **Phone: 509-679-1389** (links to tel:509-679-1389).

quotes: Altered Imports is a performance-focused automotive shop built for enthusiasts who demand more from their cars.

acceptanceCriteria: Page exists at frontend/src/pages/TunerShopPage.tsx and renders without errors.
Hero section displays 'Altered Imports' as a prominent heading.
Services section lists all 7 specializations as styled cards or list items.
Closing paragraph and 'Build different. Build altered.' tagline are displayed.
Location 'Wenatchee' is displayed under a location heading.
Instagram @mr.altered links to https://www.instagram.com/mr.altered in a new tab.
Phone 509-679-1389 is displayed as a tappable tel: link.
Page is styled consistently with the app's dark asphalt/amber automotive theme (dark backgrounds, amber accents, white text, Rajdhani/Inter fonts).

requirements.text: Register the Tuner Shop page in `frontend/src/App.tsx` as a new authenticated route at `/tuner-shop` pointing to `TunerShopPage.tsx`. Add a 'Tuner Shop' entry point accessible from the app ‚Äî either as a link in the Profile page (`frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx`) when viewing the current user's own profile (alongside the existing 'About RevGrid' link), or as a menu item in the TopBar (`frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx`). The entry point must be clearly labelled 'Tuner Shop' and navigate to `/tuner-shop`.
acceptanceCriteria: Route `/tuner-shop` is registered in App.tsx and renders TunerShopPage.
A 'Tuner Shop' navigation entry point is visible and accessible from within the authenticated app (TopBar or Profile page).
Tapping the entry point navigates to `/tuner-shop`.
The route is protected behind AuthGate (authenticated users only).

constraints: All text content for the Tuner Shop page must match exactly what was provided by the user ‚Äî do not alter shop name, service names, location, contact details, tagline, or descriptions.
Instagram link must open https://www.instagram.com/mr.altered in a new tab.
Phone number must use a tel: link (tel:509-679-1389).
Page must use the existing dark asphalt/amber design system ‚Äî no new color tokens or fonts.
nonGoals: No backend changes required ‚Äî this is a purely static frontend page.
Do not add a booking or appointment form.
Do not add the Tuner Shop to the bottom navigation bar (BottomNav).
Do not modify any immutable frontend paths.

required: Dark, moody cinematic banner image of a Honda/Acura sports car engine bay or a performance tuned import car in a garage setting with amber workshop lighting, gritty automotive atmosphere (tuner-shop-hero.dim_1920x600.jpg)
